en-US.name: food Pack
en-US.summary: The food pack is a great addition because you will hear places about food.
en-US.description: The food pack expands the set of places shared with you to include places about food.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: The food pack adds over 10 food places into the set of places randomly chosen to be shared with you.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thanks for purchasing the food pack.  You now have access to food places!

testingInstructions: Built Using Sample Fact In Skill Purchases
